segments.text: The kitchen looks warm and inviting from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman in her apron, focused on drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's left on, sink overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, unaware and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Children sneaking cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced precariously, stool tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, other with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waits with hand raised, part of the scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's growing, could cause a nasty slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is pristine and quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This disobedience bothers me so much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they'd be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
